title: 즉흥적 평가 - 비교 반응
description: 순간적인 비교를 통한 평가를 자연스럽게 표현하는 원어민 수준의 반응 표현을 구사합니다.
examples: This is definitely better than the previous one!
Compared to the others, this one's much better.
It's incomparably better than the old version.
learning_points: 원어민 수준의 자연스러운 비교 반응 표현 구사

sentences.en: This is definitely better than the previous one!

sentences.kr: 다른 거랑 비교하면, 이게 훨씬 나아.
sentences.en: Compared to the others, this one's much better.

sentences.kr: 예전 버전이랑 비교도 안 될 정도로 좋아.
sentences.en: It's incomparably better than the old version.

sentences.kr: 아, 그것보다는 이게 나을 것 같은데?
sentences.en: Ah, I think this would be better than that one?

sentences.kr: 둘 다 좋긴 한데, 굳이 고르자면 이쪽이야.
sentences.en: Both are good, but if I had to choose, it'd be this one.

sentences.kr: 이게 더 나은 것 같아. 확실히 차이가 느껴져.
sentences.en: I think this is better. I can definitely feel the difference.

sentences.kr: 다른 것들과 비교하면, 이건 차원이 달라.
sentences.en: Compared to the others, this is in a different league.

sentences.kr: 솔직히, 저번 것보다 못한 것 같은데?
sentences.en: Honestly, I think it's worse than the last one?
